scripts.build: npm run _clean && npm run _mkdist && npm run _copy && npm run _verify
scripts._copy: shx cp -f index.html dist/ && (shx cp -f _redirects dist/ || true) && (shx cp -rf assets dist/ || true) && (shx cp -rf data dist/ || true) && (shx cp -f perfumes_data.json dist/ || true) && (shx cp -f _headers dist/ || true)
scripts._verify: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const paths=['dist/perfumes_data.json','dist/assets/perfumes_data.json','dist/data/perfumes_data.json'];const found=paths.find(p=>fs.existsSync(p));if(!found){console.error('JSON not found in dist. Checked: '+paths.join(', '));process.exit(1)}else{const s=fs.statSync(found).size;console.log('JSON ok:',found,'('+s+' bytes)');}"
